attributes.action: Save the Forgotten Valley music festival
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Considering that Gordon Brown and Alistair Darling mis-managed the economy, forcing forgotten valley festival to be cancelled. It wouldnt take much. Pendulum, Hadouken, crystal castles, the enemy. the wombats! it would have been ace! but because Gordon Brown screwed up the economy , we cant go!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
